thread.title: Rep. Elijah Cummings calls for a ‘9/11-type’ investigation into Russian hacking
thread.title_full: Rep. Elijah Cummings calls for a ‘9/11-type’ investigation into Russian hacking

author: William A.
title: Rep. Elijah Cummings calls for a ‘9/11-type’ investigation into Russian hacking
text:
Rep. Elijah Cummings calls for a ‘9/11-type’ investigation into Russian hacking Posted at 7:27 pm on February 14, 2017 by William A. 
Rep. Elijah Cummings has been very busy today. 
First, he joined his colleague Rep. Nancy Pelosi in citing a tweet from a fake Twitter account: BAHAHA again! Eli Cummings punked by the same Flynn PARODY account that punked Pelosi https://t.co/pH7ZyEQw5v 
— Twitchy Team (@TwitchyTeam) February 14, 2017 
Then, a little later on, he told ABC News that he would support the creation of a “9/11-type commission” to investigate Russian tampering in the 2016 election: . @RepCummings tells @marykbruce he supports a "9/11-type commission" to investigate Russia’s involvement in election https://t.co/KNncnBvM69 pic.twitter.com/gFAjPMCBgf 
— ABC News Politics (@ABCPolitics) February 14, 2017 Trending
